text: Dhoti is a white piece of cloth worn by South Asian people. They have different ways be worn. In West Bengal their wearing style is known as koncha style. Nowadays people use them in occasional purposes. Earlier they were worn by rich zamindars. The Dhoti is a commonly worn national dress-code for Indian men. Category:Religious clothing Category:Indian clothing Category:National symbols of India Category:Pakistani clothing Category:Hinduism
title: Dhoti
